definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
to declare to be untrue/to deny
decline to comment/not express an opinion/be noncommittal/hedge

sentences.english: God chose you. Did you deserve it?
sentences.chinese: 上帝选择了你，你受之无愧否？

sentences.english: Do you cheat on your taxes?
No, I didn't get any subvention from Taiwan's government this year.
sentences.chinese: □否，本年度未获任何经费补助。

sentences.english: Oil is strategic goods in the process of China's sustainable economic development.
sentences.chinese: 石油非闭解中邦经济否连续收铺的从要和略物资。

sentences.english: Plus, opinions are not yes or no questions.
sentences.chinese: 另外，不要问“是”或“否”的问题。

sentences.english: Don't answer questions with a simple "yes" or "no".
sentences.chinese: 不要用简单的“是”或“否”来回答问题。

sentences.english: Do you believe money is everything?
I ask you whether the lake is green or not, hanging from the southeast branch.
sentences.chinese: 我随手编了一句，问君湖绿否，自挂东南枝。

sentences.english: Will it ever cloy , this odd diversity of misery and joy?
sentences.chinese: 在这痛苦和快乐的交重中，我会否生厌？

sentences.english: No. People are moral agents who weigh many considerations.
sentences.chinese: 否，人是讲道德的动物，会衡量多方面的考虑。

sentences.english: I asked the old monk, did some people often come here? Why was the temple so decline as now?
sentences.chinese: 我问老僧，有人常来此地否，寺庙又何以败落如此。

sentences.english: Will the flight 808 from Paris to London is on schedule?
sentences.chinese: 由巴黎飞往伦敦的808号班机会否准时起飞？

sentences.english: If the answer is no, ignore it and move on.
sentences.chinese: 如果你的回答是‘否’，那么你大可直接无视他。

sentences.english: Assuredly the old General is in trouble at the capital.
sentences.chinese: 莫非老将军在许昌有事否？
上帝选择了你，你受之无愧否？

definition: (classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)
youngest/most junior/tiny/one (unambiguous spoken form when spelling out numbers, esp. on telephone or in military)/one or ace on dice or dominoes/variant of 吆[yao1], to shout
